keyword: calories in a head of cauliflower
title: Calories in a Head of Cauliflower
meta_description: Discover calories in a head of cauliflower, including macros like carbs, fiber, protein, and fat, plus per-100g basis and preparation tweaks for better nutrition tracking.
h1: Calories in a Head of Cauliflower
assumptions: Medium head (~500 g total weight), raw, white variety; florets and core included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, freshness, and preparation method. Check labels or weigh for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A medium head of cauliflower provides ~125 kcal and ~10 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Roasted with 1 tsp oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in a head of cauliflower?
faqs.a: About 125 kcal for a medium 500 g head.
Yes, ~25 g total carbs per head, with 10 g fiber netting ~15 g.

faqs.q: How much fiber in a head of cauliflower?
Does cooking change calories in cauliflower?
faqs.a: Minimal change if steamed; roasting with oil adds calories.

faqs.q: What size is a medium head of cauliflower?
faqs.a: Around 500 g; smaller heads ~300 g (75 kcal), larger ~700 g (175 kcal).
